name: Barcelona Flight School
about: Barcelona Flight School, located at Sabadell Airport just 20 kilometers from Barcelona, is the professional pilots school of Aeroclub Barcelona-Sabadell, the second oldest and largest aeroclub in Europe. With over 60 years of experience, the school boasts a fleet of over 40 aircraft, including fixed-wing and helicopters, and a team of 20 experienced instructors. Certified by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) and the Agencia Estatal de Seguridad AÃ©rea (AESA), the school offers comprehensive training programs such as Integrated ATPL, Modular ATPL, Private Pilot License, and various ratings. Known for its high success rate, with over 90% of students passing exams on their first attempt, Barcelona Flight School provides an ideal environment for aspiring pilots, combining advanced theory with intensive flight practices and enjoying over 300 flyable days per year. Join us to embark on a successful and sustainable aviation career.
services:
